title: Red Receives the Invitation
summary: Red's mother hands her a basket and a letter from her grandmother, inviting Red to visit. Despite warnings of a mysterious stranger lurking in the woods, Red decides to deliver the basket herself, motivated by her grandmother's urgent request for company and her own curiosity.

title: Encounter at the Forest Path
summary: On her journey, Red meets the charming woodsman, Elias, who warns her about taking the main path due to a recent wolf sighting. Red decides to take the scenic route instead, challenging Elias to join her. Elias, intrigued by Red's audacity, agrees, setting the stage for their budding connection.

title: Wolf’s Tempting Proposal
summary: The wolf, disguised as a traveler, intercepts Red and Elias, offering to guide them to grandmother’s house in exchange for a share of their basket. Elias suspects foul play and confronts the wolf. Red chooses to trust Elias, rejecting the wolf’s offer and causing the wolf to plot revenge.

title: Race to Grandmother’s Cottage
summary: Red and Elias realize the wolf is heading toward the cottage ahead of them. They split up: Elias takes a shortcut to warn the grandmother, while Red tries to outrun the wolf on her path. Both face obstacles—Elias fights through brambles, and Red evades wolf traps—demonstrating their determination and concern for one another.

title: The Wolf’s Deception
summary: The wolf arrives first and deceives Grandmother, locking her in a closet and disguising himself as her. Elias bursts in, confronts the wolf, and a struggle ensues. Red arrives in time to witness Elias risking himself to protect her, and together they outsmart the wolf, rescuing Grandmother.

title: Revelations and Romantic Decision
summary: With the wolf defeated, Red and Elias share a moment alone. Elias confesses his feelings, revealing his motivation for protecting Red was not just duty but love. Red admits her growing affection and chooses to stay and help Elias and Grandmother rebuild, marking the start of their relationship.
